ability.Pressure: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Defense and Special Defense of opponents by 1 stage.

Dragon Pulse.effect: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Sky Attack.effect: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user raises its Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage. On the second, has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
